snippet: Manuel Locatelli, an 18-year-old midfielder, and Gianluigi Donnarumma, a 17-year-old goalkeeper, have helped carry Milan toward the top of the Serie A standings....
abstract: Rory Smith On Soccer column examines effort by AC Milan to restore club's fortunes with overhaul of its youth development system; describes team's transformation from institution mired in its past glories to one staking its future on promising cohort of young players.
lead_paragraph: Manuel Locatelli, an 18-year-old midfielder, and Gianluigi Donnarumma, a 17-year-old goalkeeper, have helped carry Milan toward the top of the Serie A standings.

headline.main: Push to Develop Young Players Revives A.C. Milan
headline.print_headline: Push to Develop Young Players Revives a Faded Power
